name: Rocket Boost (Ratingthomas)
description:
Rocket Boost

Rocket Boost is a relaxing but frustrating game. Your target is to reach the red platform. 

NOTE: This games is in development. If you found bugs, post a messages in my discord or in comments section.

My Youtube Channel 

Special tanks to Jakob (visenco)
